Class TestStupidModelContextBuilder

public class TestStupidModelContextBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Tests created to verify the ContextBuilder implementation.

                                                                      stupidmodel.StupidModelContextBuilder contextBuilder,
                                                                      repast.simphony.engine.environment.Runner runner)
Creates a context with the specified number of bugs by default with the specified context builder.

Parameters:
bugCount - the number of bugs to create
contextBuilder - the context builder instance to use for creation
runner - the Runner instance to use for the creation (otherwise it is null)
Returns:
a properly initialized context with TestStupidModelContextBuilder
